channel.title: Assignment overview | R for Business Analytics

item.title: Week 7
item.description:
Reflection

Please submit your reflection via canvas by Wednesday at 11:59pm.

Here are the guidelines for reflections.

Here is a project on RStudio Cloud that includes a template for reflections.

You can access this week’s readings and guiding questions using the class schedule under the “Content” tag.

Lab

TBD
